message.body: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <tbl> <card_type>201</card_type> <card_no>330201198801011234</card_no> <full_name>姓名1</full_name> <!--授信产品代码--> <credit_product>NBYHBLT</credit_product> <!--授信受理编号--> <credit_seq>6dbaaf2401e87da4d163c3e99f0</credit_seq> <!--授信期限 月数--> <credit_period>12</credit_period> <!--授信金额--> <credit_amount>120000</credit_amount> <!--授信日期--> <credit_date>2017-08-19</credit_date> </tbl>
